name: Meme Streets
description:
Made for  for Github's Game Off Game Jam 2017. Meme streets is a 8-bit retro style side scrolling beat-em-up where Memes, old and new, battle for survival. Some memes have chosen a heroic path, many more have gone bad. And now our heroes need to bring down their villanous counterparts or else lose the city to crime and corruption.

The game was developed in Godot 2.1.4

Github Repository: https://github.com/dashbangsplat/memestreets
